name: One Monster RPG: Running out of slime
name_original: One Monster RPG: Running out of slime
description: A game where our seasoned hero is mere inches away from gaining enough XP to reach Level 100. But oh no! There is only one monster left in the world, and this mere cannon fodder won't drop enough XP for our hero to level up. It's time to think backwards, and feed the enemy for it to grow before you strike it down.
